msg: [KARAF-691] Udate the RELEASE-NOTES in preparation for the Cellar release.

author: markt
msg: Increase size of file the test tries to send since there is enough buffering on my system that 200k can hide in the buffers triggering a test failure (the limit works - it just fails in a way the test doesn't expect)

msg: [UIMA-2158] - added assembly configuration trick to avoid default source release descriptor usage, changed src.xml id to uima-addons-source-release

author: hwright
msg: Release docs: Create a new section about "Creating a release" and include
the section on signing releases in it.  Update to reference various ASF docs
and to reflect our current procedures.
(preface): Add a paragraph referencing ASF docs.
(tarball-signing): Fold into release-creating, and add a couple of paragraphs
about why signing releases is important.
